quiz.question: Which burger chain used the tagline "Have It Your Way"?
Which brand used "The Ultimate Driving Machine" to emphasize performance?
Which slogan launched in 1993 as a question to boost milk consumption?
Which insurer uses "Like a good neighbor, State Farm is there"?
Who wrote the famous line "A diamond is forever" for De Beers?
Whose last words inspired Dan Wieden to coin "Just Do It" for Nike?
Which beauty brand uses "Because You're Worth It"?
Which beverage brand once used the classic line "The Pause That Refreshes"?
Which famous tagline was created by an agency to capitalize on being second in market share?
Which fast-food chain uses "Finger Lickin' Good"?
Which home product used a superlative slogan claiming quick cleanup superiority?
Which slogan's origin story involves a copywriter reacting to a client brief about desire and worth?
Which automaker uses the German slogan "Vorsprung durch Technik"?
Which company introduced the global tagline "Open Happiness"?
Which brand's slogan translates roughly as "Progress through Technology"?
